title: Education for All
subtitle: Improving access to quality education
description: We run after-school programs, provide learning materials, and support teachers to improve educational outcomes.
impact: Over 2,000 children supported with learning resources and mentorship.

title: Women Empowerment
subtitle: Skills training and economic opportunities
description: We provide vocational training and micro-grants to women entrepreneurs.
impact: Hundreds of women started sustainable small businesses with seed funding and training.
